title: Hurry Make Love
lyrics:
Don't leave me at home too long, don't let me fall asleep on a song
Don't stay up with your damn TV, somebody else might make love to me
Chorus:
Hurry, hurry, hurry make love to me
Hurry, hurry, hurry make love to me
I don't believe in lying, no, I don't watch all that tall grass grow

Don't believe in 'darn' and 'sucks', I just believe in love talks

chorus - now

(Solo)

chorus repeats 2x
